This group bundle together the information that comprises a service-node
The name of the service node
The IP and port used to configure this service-node
A list of service function forwarders resident in this service node
A list of service functions resident in this service node
Physical or virtual element that hosts one or more service function forwarders
The list that contains all service-nodes in the domain
